page.title: 09SHOPPING IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {FINSBAY}_1 grocer's shop with post office {RODEL }_electrical business & shop _1 pottery business {STROND}_1 grocer's shop & post office {NORTHTON}_1grocer's shop & post office {LEVERBURGH}_1 self service store with post office, cafeteria and craft shop. There is 1 other craft shop. Grocery Vans also provide a service to all villages. People have to travel 80km to{ {STORNOWAY},our nearest town, if they require to buy specialised goods such as clothes and furniture.Shopping for these items, especially clothes is also done through mail order catalogues.
